name: The Final Disaster
description:
A New Year's celebration has gone horribly wrong. Run away from the ball while saving pedestrians!

Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad):

  • Move: WASD / Left Joystick
  • Jump: Spacebar / South face button

Credits:

  • Ben Przysucha - Programmer
  • Zachary Singer - Programmer
  • Zach Hale  - Programmer
  • Joe Rannells - 3D Animator/Prop Modeler
  • Harrison Trinh - Artist
